metadata.inclusion:
1. Triple-press the add button. The LED will blink once per second during inclusion.
2. The LED flashes 3 times on success or stops blinking if it fails.
3. Place the alarm on its base and wait 30 seconds.
4. Press the test button to verify.
metadata.exclusion:
1. Triple-press the button. The LED will double-blink once per second during removal.
2. The LED flashes 5 times on success or stops blinking if it fails.
3. Remove the battery.
metadata.reset:
1. Press and hold the button for 10 seconds until the LED goes off.
2. Release the button. The LED will flash once.
3. Remove the battery.
